sourcesContent:
export default {
  email: {
    required: 'Please enter your email address',
    invalid: 'Please enter a valid email address'
  },
  parentEmail: {
    required: "Please enter student's email address"
  },
  password: {
    required: 'Please enter your password',
    newPassword: 'Please enter new password',
    oldPassword: 'Please enter current password',
    confirmNewPassword: 'Please enter confirm new password',
    passwordPattern:
      'Password should be min 8 characters long with one special character, number, lower and upper case letter',
    same: 'Mismatch new password and confirm new password'
  },
  firstName: {
    required: 'Please enter first name',
    alphaOnly: 'First name could only consist alphabets'
  },
  lastName: {
    required: 'Please enter last name',
    alphaOnly: 'Last name could only consist alphabets'
  },
  parentFirstName: {
    required: "Please enter student's first name",
    alphaOnly: "Student's first name could only consist alphabets"
  },
  parentLastName: {
    required: "Please enter student's last name",
    alphaOnly: "Student's last name could only consist alphabets"
  },
  parentName: {
    required: "Please enter parent's first name",
    alphaOnly: "Parent's first name could only consist alphabets"
  },

  parentLName: {
    required: "Please enter parent's last name",
    alphaOnly: "Parent's last name could only consist alphabets"
  },

  day: { required: 'Please select day' },
  month: { required: 'Please select month' },
  year: { required: 'Please select year' },
  DOBDay: { required: 'Select day' },
  DOBMonth: { required: 'Select month' },
  DOBYear: { required: 'Select year' },
  city: { required: 'Please enter city' },
  state: { required: 'Please enter state' },
  country: { required: 'Please enter country' },
  summary: { required: 'Please enter summary' },
  instituteName: { required: 'Please enter institute' },
  startDate: { required: 'Please select date' },
  endDate: { required: 'Please select date' },
  title: { required: 'Please enter title' },
  description: { required: 'Please enter description' },
  competency: { required: 'Please select competency' },
  importance: { required: 'Please select achievement level' },
  skills: { required: 'Please select skills' },
  fromYear: { required: 'Please select year' },
  toYear: { required: 'Please select year' },
  fromGrade: { required: 'Please select grade' },
  toGrade: { required: 'Please select grade' },
  request: { required: 'Please enter request' },
  recommendation: { required: 'Please enter Recommendation' },
  recommenderTitle: { required: 'Please enter recommender title' },
  birthDate: { required: 'Please select your date of birth' },
  groupName: { required: 'Please enter group name' },
  aboutGroup: { required: "Please enter group's motive" },
  passwordPattern:
    'Please select a New Password: Password should be min 8 characters long with one special character, number, lower and upper case letter',
  designation: {required: "Please enter designation"},
  organisation: {required: "Please enter organisation"},
  industry: {required: "Please enter industry"},
  functionalArea: {required: "Please enter functionalArea"},
  role: {required: "Please enter role"}, 
  profileRole: {required: "Please enter profileRole"},   
  location: {required: "Please enter location"}, 
  mobileNo: {required: "Please enter mobileNo"},
  skills: {required: "Please enter skills"}, 
  rating: {required: "Please enter rating"},
  projectName: {required: "Please enter projectName"},     
  company:{required: "Please select company"} ,
  companyName:{required: "Please enter companyName"},
  offeredDesignation:{required: "Please enter designation"},
  nextEmployer :{required: "Please enter your next Employer"},
  currentSalary : {required: "Please select your salary"},
  lakh : {required: "Please enter salary in lakhs"},
  thousand : {required: "Please enter salary in thousands"},
  noticePeriod: {required: "Kindly select notice period"},
  offeredSalary : {required: "Please select your offered salary"},
  offeredSalaryInLakh : {required: "Please enter salary in lakhs"},
  offeredSalaryInThousand : {required: "Please enter salary in thousands"},
  desiredLocation:{required: "Kindly select desired location"},
  desiredIndustry:{required: "Kindly select desired industry"}
};
